title: Strengthening Service Quality Competencies: Analyzing Trends in Distance Education Research: Topic Modeling Through Text Mining

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain 35 years of distance education research trends categorized into 5-year thematic intervals.
Learners can practice extracting key concepts from academic materials using text-mining tools.
Through project-based assessments, learners can produce reports visualizing developmental stages of distance education research topics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
